content.query:
COPY INTO DailySalesCopyCommand
(StoreCode default 'XXXXX' 1, Date 2, TotalSales 3, TotalAmount 4)
FROM 'https://myworkspacetestfiles.blob.core.windows.net/sales/dailysales/*.csv'
WITH (
    FILE_TYPE = 'CSV',
    CREDENTIAL = (IDENTITY='Shared Access Signature', SECRET='[Key]'),
    ENCODING = 'UTF8',
    FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
    FIRSTROW=2
)

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DailySalesCopyCommand
